forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High near 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low -4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low 28F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will diminish to a few snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will taper off as a few snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 25F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
